items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Fits well, is soft and comfortable. Great color! Read more
items.author: Margaret Abbott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Dress!
items.body: This dress is a winner! Super cute, very flattering and just love the soft material. Sizing is spot on and the sleeves are a mesh material but very comfortable. Definitely recommend this sexy dress. Read more
items.author: RA

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Different then the pictures
items.body: I am very disappointed in my dress, it is totally different from the pictures and reviews. The back is not the same and the sleeves are very big, not tight as the pictures showed. The seams are also coming out by the armpit making it look cheap. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!! Great price too!
items.body: Super cute, great quality, perfect for a special date night or formal event! The bow on the back is adorable and adds a little detail. Color: Black / Mesh Fit: Very flattering!! See through: No Read more
items.author: Bill baylog

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini black dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love this dress, Iâ€™ve wore it many times since I bought it a while back. It has held up very well, itâ€™s been washed multiple times too. Like I said it is super comfortable and really cute fits like a glove! You canâ€™t go wrong with a black dress! Read more
items.author: Jocy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy
items.body: The back of this dress is so flattering. The material is thick and stretchy. It had no off putting smell. The shoulders were comfortable and not tight. The dress is entirely too short for me. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 and curvy. I need a little more coverage. Read more
items.author: shamriel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price for a well made dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, great cut and style! Sexy and well fitted. I did not find defective seams or shape/cut in this dress like I do often with affordable fashion. Read more
items.author: c

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
items.body: Wore it to a wedding & got a ton of compliments! Very comfy & good quality for the price! I'm 5"2' & a 32D but the dress was tight enough to give me a little liftðŸ˜‰ enough that I didn't need to bother with a sticky bra or nip covers. Read more
items.author: Caitlin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, White, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Hot Pink, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
